sources.title: In Pursuit (CRIME THRILLER with DANIEL BALDWIN films German complete, new crime novels 2023)
2000 - In Pursuit - Out of time… out of luck… out of control - starring Claudia Schiffer, Coolio
sources.description:
Hotshot attorney Rick (Daniel Baldwin) finds passion with Catherine (Claudia Schiffer), but their affair turns fatal. Now framed for a crime, Rick must clear his name while evading a relentless pursuit.

Original title: In Pursuit (2000) 
Alternative title: Blood Money / Rules of the Game

Director: Peter Pistor
Writers: Michael Kalesniko

Main cast:
Daniel Baldwin - Rick
Claudia Schiffer - Catherine Wells
Coolio - Carl Wright
Dean Stockwell - Charles Welz
Sarah Lassez - Abby Berkhoff
Kim Rhodes - Ann Sutton

Genres: Action, Drama, Thriller, Crime, Romance
Release date: November 16, 2000
Filming location: Santa Clarita

metadata.Plot: An attorney is accused of murdering a powerful man after having an affair with his sultry wife.
metadata.Actors: Daniel Baldwin, Claudia Schiffer, Coolio, Sarah Lassez
